name: SilverFrame(纯白星原)
description:
This is a 3D space combat game.You will be driving a transformable fighter to perform missions singly or with your wingman.There are large fleet, missile barrage, super beam cannon, dog-fighting and other exciting challenges waiting for you.
The game supports split screen cooperation or confrontation. And there is a custom campaign mode, players can according to their own preferences, free configuration of a battle, used to exercise combat skills.
